mapper.select: SELECT t.staffName, t.staffId, t.staffNo, t.Tel, t.Addr, t.City, t.companyId, t.Email, t.Age, t.sts, t.createTime, t.remark, t.updateTime FROM staffManager t WHERE t.staffNo = #{staffNo} AND t.staffPws = #{staffPws} and t.companyId = #{companyId} and t.sts = 0

select t.staffName, t.staffId, t.staffNo, t.Tel, t.Addr, t.City, t.companyId, t.Email, t.Age, t.sts, t.createTime, t.remark, t.updateTime FROM staffManager t
ORDER BY t.createTime DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staffManager t ( t.staffName, t.staffNo, t.Tel, t.Addr, t.City, t.companyId, t.Email, t.Age, t.remark ) VALUES (#{staffName},#{staffNo},#{Tel},#{Addr},#{City},#{companyId},#{Email},#{Age},#{remark})
